snippet: BLUHM--Peter Dwight, of Brooklyn, NY, died March 13, 2016. Survived by wife, Susan, daughter, Elizabeth, and siblings, Louise Jeanne, Margaret Carey, and Christopher Bluhm. Funeral service April 2, 1pm at Grace Church, Brooklyn Heights. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLUHM--Peter Dwight, of Brooklyn, NY, died March 13, 2016. Survived by wife, Susan, daughter, Elizabeth, and siblings, Louise Jeanne, Margaret Carey, and Christopher Bluhm. Funeral service April 2, 1pm at Grace Church, Brooklyn Heights. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLUHM, PETER DWIGHT
